name: faker-aws-cloudwatch-real
description: Real AWS CloudWatch MCP server wrapped by faker for E2E testing

args: Simulate AWS CloudWatch during CPU performance crisis. When get_metric_data is called, return time series data showing EC2 CPU spike from 20% to 95% over 6 hours. When analyze_metric is called, detect anomaly started 2 AM UTC. When get_active_alarms is called, return ALARM state for CPUUtilization threshold breach on i-0abc123def456. Use proper AWS CloudWatch response format with timestamps, namespaces, dimensions.
